name: Yogi Language File
summary: Learn about .YOGI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Yogi is a lightweight, open-source programming language designed to be simple and easy to use, especially for beginning developers. Since Yogi is open source, developers can customize it to extend the capabilities of the language.

description: A YOGI file is a plain text file that contains the Yogi programming language. It stores source code in a syntax similar to Python and JavaScript that a user can execute directly on the computer instead of compiling into machine code.

instructions: You can open a YOGI file and execute its code with Yogi in Windows. You can also open and edit a YOGI file with any text or source code editor, including Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (macOS), or Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform).
